title: Bug 16075Strange Cut/Copy and Paste behavior
description: Bug 16075Strange Cut/Copy and Paste behavior I was trying to move to compilation units from one project to another in theJava Browsing perspective.
OB: I then tried to Paste them in another package by selecting the targetpackage in the packages view but paste wasn't enabled.
SR: I selected them in the types brwoser and selectedCut. I then tried to Paste them in another package by selecting the targetpackage in the packages view but paste wasn't enabled. I tried to paste them inthe navigator and was told that the resource no longer existed.After restoring the files from local history, I chose Copy instead and Pastedinto the new package. I had two entries for each file pasted.
